articles.title: Katy Perry Gets Called Out By American Idol Contestant For "Mom Shaming" - E! NEWS
articles.description: After judge Katy Perry made a joke about a young American Idol hopeful already having three kids, the 25-year-old contestant fired back at Katy on TikTok. Find out what she said.
articles.content:
This American Idol contestant is angry as a mother.
Shortly after her audition for the 31st season of the singing competition aired, Sara Beth Liebe shared her response to a joke judge Katy Perry ma… [+1010 chars]

articles.description: Twin Cities woman diagnosed at 34 years old shares her story
articles.content:
MINNEAPOLIS Bridgette O'Brien says the signs were subtle.
"It was the summer of 2019. I was having some minor pains and I ended up going to the doctor," she says.
